Changdong Oh

Yonsei University, Department of Sociology | lamancha91@gmail.com

Computational Social Science Researcher

I'm a graduate student in Yonsei University's Department of Sociology. I have interest in computational and experimental methods in social sciences. Now I'm doing works related to public opinion/communication, party politics, and social movements in South Korea and United States.

Contact me
